__TOC__

Here, I will be outlining a blueprint for a method to personalize the Ubuntu distribution across an organization and across multiple installs. It will leverage existing technologies in Ubuntu to accomplish this. The goal is to provide for enhanced configuration management for enterprises and single users alike, so that users get to choose what software they want on their Ubuntu installation ''before'' the DVD is even finished downloading.
